queries.UNIQUE_CLAUSE: select * from students where name='{client.name}' and college='{client.college}'
queries.INSERT: insert into students values((select max(id) from students)+1,'{server.create_name}','{client.age}','{client.address}','{client.college}','{server.timestamp}')
queries.UPDATE: update students set address = '{client.address}', college = '{client.college}', updated = '{server.timestamp()}' where id = {client.id}
queries.UPDATE_VERIFY: select * from students where name='{client.name}' and address='{client.address}' and college='{client.college}'
